backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing blog posts, contact forms, and user profiles with admin‑restricted CRUD operations and authorization checks.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features to source files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: List of concise summaries for all frontend files describing their roles and functionality.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining global design tokens, light/dark theme variables, and base styles.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file mounting the React app and loading the main TypeScript entry point.
frontend/README.md: Project documentation explaining stack differences, features, and local development setup for the React+Motoko website.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React router configuration defining all public and admin routes and wrapping the app with layout and theme providers.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminGuard: Admin access guard enforcing Internet Identity login and admin role before rendering protected pages.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminHeade: Admin header component providing navigation links and authentication actions.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminLayou: Wrapper layout for admin pages with guard, header, and routed content area.
frontend/src/components/admin/AuthButton: Login/logout button using Internet Identity with loading and error handling.
frontend/src/components/admin/ProfileSet: Modal prompting new authenticated users to enter and save their profile name.
frontend/src/components/public/Footer.ts: Public site footer with links, contact info, and social media icons.
frontend/src/components/public/Header.ts: Responsive public header with navigation menus and mobile drawer.
frontend/src/components/public/PublicLay: Public-facing layout composing header, routed content, and footer.
frontend/src/components/public/ui/Button: Button-styled link component wrapping router Link with button variants.
frontend/src/components/public/ui/Sectio: Reusable section heading with title and optional subtitle.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refetching when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuthz.ts: Hooks for fetching user role, admin status, profile, and saving profile via actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication lifecycle.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Hooks for fetching blog posts, individual posts, and submitting contact forms via actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind layers and defines extensive CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and an Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page with a banner, institute overview, and mission/vision/values cards.
Displays academic partners with a banner and grid of partner cards.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminBlogEditor: Provides an admin blog editor page with a placeholder editor card.
Shows admin blog management with a New Post button and a placeholder list of posts.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Displays the admin dashboard with cards linking to blog management, enquiries, and future analytics.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminEnquiriesP: Renders an admin enquiries page with a placeholder list of recent enquiries.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminEnquiryDet: Shows a detail view layout for a single enquiry with placeholder content.
frontend/src/pages/BlogDetailPage.tsx: Shows a single blog post with loading states, metadata, and HTML-rendered content.
frontend/src/pages/BlogsListPage.tsx: Lists blog posts with thumbnails, tags, and links, handling loading and empty states.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Provides a contact form with validation and submission plus institute contact info.
frontend/src/pages/CoursesPage.tsx: Shows course offerings with descriptive cards and links to apply.
frontend/src/pages/EducationLoanPage.tsx: Displays an education loan information page with a banner, partner banks, and loan benefits using cards and headings.
frontend/src/pages/EligibilityPage.tsx: Shows admission eligibility criteria for diploma and degree programs and includes a call-to-action button to apply.
frontend/src/pages/EventsPage.tsx: Renders a list of upcoming events with dates and descriptions using a grid of cards.
frontend/src/pages/FacultyPage.tsx: Lists faculty members with images, titles, and brief descriptions in a responsive card grid.
frontend/src/pages/FaqPage.tsx: Provides a FAQ section using an accordion with common questions and detailed answers.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home page with hero section, stats, and an about preview promoting courses and institute highlights.
frontend/src/pages/IndustryVisitPage.tsx: Shows information on industry visits and displays a grid of visit-related images.
frontend/src/pages/InfrastructurePage.ts: Describes campus infrastructure with facility details and supporting images.
frontend/src/pages/InternationalCoursesP: Page showcasing international study programs, tours, internships, and certifications offered by the institute.
frontend/src/pages/InternshipPage.tsx: Displays details about structured internships, partner hotels, career growth, and benefits with an application link.
frontend/src/pages/LeadershipPage.tsx: Introduces the institute’s leadership team with profiles and experience summaries.
frontend/src/pages/NewsPage.tsx: Renders a grid of recent news items with dates, titles, and short descriptions.
frontend/src/pages/PlacementPage.tsx: Outlines placement support, top recruiters, the placement process, and career development offerings.
frontend/src/pages/ScholarshipTestPage.t: Explains merit-based scholarship tiers and provides a link to register for the scholarship test.
frontend/src/pages/TestimonialsPage.tsx: Shows student testimonials with names, positions, and feedback presented in card format.
frontend/src/pages/TrainingProgramPage.t: Renders a public Training Programs page with a hero banner and a grid of training program cards.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, retrieving, and clearing URL and session parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending colors, layout settings, animations, and enabling plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing goals, architecture, required images, and existing implemented features.
